programme.title: George Gershwin (1898-1937)
programme.short_synopsis: The life and music of George Gershwin and a post-Soviet boom in Russian immigration to NY.
programme.medium_synopsis: Composer George Gershwin's life and music is remembered for the centenary of his birth and a consideration of the history and post-Soviet boom in Russian immigration to New York.
